comments:
nightly build n0314

I get the following exception on startup with this nightly build. I have the
debug view docked and stacked behind a couple other views. 

There did not seem to be any side effects from this. (I was able to use the view
with no problems.

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-03-14 12:42:38.427
!MESSAGE Warning: Detected attempt by view org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugView to
create itself recursively (this is probably, but not necessarily, a bug)

Fixed in LaunchView.

The view was initializing its "active" state when created, but it turns out we 
also get a perspective changed notificaion that also initializes this state 
when the view is created. The code was redundant and can be removed.
*** Bug 89060 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

traces.message: Warning: Detected attempt by view org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugView to create itself recursively (this is probably, but  not necessarily, a bug)
